scripts.dev: npm run build && docker run -p 8080:8080 -d latexcompiler
scripts.push: tsc && docker buildx build -t fxml/latexcompiler --platform linux/amd64 . && docker tag fxml/latexcompiler us-west1-docker.pkg.dev/quickprose-9b693/latex-compiler/compiler && docker push us-west1-docker.pkg.dev/quickprose-9b693/latex-compiler/compiler
